error.dependencies_not_installed: Mandatory dependencies not installed. Come to /path/ and run `pip install -r requirements.txt`

credential_file.not_found: Credential file not found. Come to /path/, create file named `credentials` from `credentials.example` and fill with needed data.
credential_file.have_no_needed_content:
Acquire credentials and store to /path//credentials:
    Telegram API key and API hash from this link: https://my.telegram.org/apps
    Bot token from telegram bot BotFather
